alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued April 21 at 2:42PM CDT until April 23 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM CDT SATURDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected tonight into early Saturday morning. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 possible early Sunday morning. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 8 AM CDT Saturday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Saturday night through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
